title: Exercise Employee Stock Options
description: A client wants to exercise their vested employee stock options and sell the shares immediately (a 'cashless' exercise).

tasks.description: Verify the client's stock option grant details, including number of vested options and strike price.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the client has 1,000 vested options with a strike price of $10.

tasks.description: Execute the cashless exercise: simultaneously exercise the options and sell the resulting shares at the current market price.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully executes the exercise-and-sell transaction.

tasks.description: Calculate and explain the net proceeds to the client after deducting the exercise cost and taxes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the final cash amount that will be deposited into the client's account.
